title: Product A Specifications
text: Product A features a 12-inch display, 8GB RAM, and 256GB SSD. Price ₹7,999. Includes a one-year limited warranty. Available in black and silver.

title: Product B Specifications
text: Product B is a Bluetooth-enabled smart speaker with 360-degree sound, 20-hour battery life, and water resistance. Price ₹3,499.

title: Coupon & Discount Rules
text: Coupons cannot be combined. A maximum discount of ₹500 applies per order. Festival coupons are valid only once per user.

title: Inventory & Stock Status
text: Items marked 'In Stock' ship within 24 hours. 'Out of Stock' items cannot be purchased. Customers can opt-in for restock alerts.

title: Payment Methods
text: Supported payment methods include UPI, credit cards, debit cards, net banking, and cash on delivery. EMI available for orders above ₹5,000.
